title: 2 Products
text: How does 0xKYC work? Connect to dApp, Scan your ID, Get your 0xKYC!

section.title: “Light” KYC - public (without PII)
section.content: Creates your Soulbound token that everyone can see but only those who can read our ZKs can read This informs our clients (ex. DeFi protocols / DAOs) a user has a full KYC check available We charge for the light KYC on a per check basis (small margin over our KYC provider)

section.title: Full KYC - private (with PII)
section.content: Since, we have the full KYC data from the “light” KYC check - we just don’t put it on-chain - we can sell this Data to our clients (ex. Defi protocols / DAO) at user’s consent, therefore enabling us to sell data from one check Multiple times (widening our margin) and enabling us for use cases where users fill KYC check requirements Without having to scan their ID one more time (sometimes a biometric liveness check is necessary and that’s it)
